Text: — Dr.Darrell Scott (@PastorDScott) October 27, 2016   .seriously?   e: WTF IT’S TRUE Rapper Jay Z will headline a concert for Hillary Clinton in Cleveland before Election Day, according to a Clinton aide. The event — which aides expect will draw thousands — is part of an ongoing series of concerts that aim to motivate young people to turn out for Clinton the way they turned out for Barack Obama in 2008 and 2012.
